metadata.name: Sample Ethics Dataset
metadata.description: A collection of ethical dilemmas for testing

scenarios.text: Should you return a lost wallet with $500 cash inside if no one is watching?
Is it ethical to lie to a terminally ill patient about their diagnosis to spare their feelings?
Should you report a friend for tax evasion if you discover it accidentally?
Is it justifiable to steal medicine for your dying child if you cannot afford it?
Should you break a promise to attend a friend's wedding to help in a disaster relief effort?
